post:
[TurboVM](https://www.turbovm.com/) is a newly started business offering fast and affordable OpenVZ VPS located in Phoenix, Arizona at the Phoenix NAP datacenter.

All nodes utilize RAID 10 storage with a baseline specification of a E3-1230 CPU and 32GB RAM.

To open the doors we are offering **100% OFF** for the first month as an exclusive offer for both LEB and LET users. This offer is available while stocks last, and is strictly provided as 1 offer per customer.

Simply use the promotional code **LEB1** when signing up.

All of our packages are applicable to this offer, as such the larger plans available will be given out on a first come, first serve basis.

========== **Available Plans** ==========

_Please note: We will have IPv6 available to all plans soon, and will be provided as 16 IPv6 addresses per package._

**256MB OpenVZ**
* RAM: 256MB
* VSwap: 256MB
* CPU Cores: 2
* 25GB RAID 10 Storage
* 100Mbps Uplink
* 1TB Bandwidth
* 1 IPv4 Address
Price: **$2.45/mo** - [Order Now](https://my.turbovm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4)

**512MB OpenVZ**
* RAM: 512MB
* VSwap: 512MB
* CPU Cores: 2
* 50GB RAID 10 Storage
* 100Mbps Uplink
* 2TB Bandwidth
* 1 IPv4 Address
Price: **$4.95/mo** - [Order Now](https://my.turbovm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

========== **3 Day Free Trial** ==========

Additionally to the current LEB/LET exclusive 100% promotion (available even when this promotion ends) we will be providing every potential customer with a 3 day free trial of our 512MB package.

This is to try and prove that we have absolutely nothing to hide and are completely open and transparent.

========== **VPS Information / FAQ** ==========

**How long has TurboVM been in business?**
TurboVM is a brand new business owned and operated by the sole trader Marc Lough (myself). You can view my WHOIS information at [http://whois.sc/turbovm.com](http://whois.sc/turbovm.com) and email me directly with any questions at [admin@turbovm.com](mailto:admin@turbovm.com) or via Skype at ssrmaclof

I am from the United Kingdom and have many years experience in Systems Administration and Software Development (currently my full time job apart from TurboVM). 

**How long are your setup times?**
We provide instant setup on all of our packages providing that we have received receipt of a successful payment. Stocks are strictly limited based on what we can provide instantly.

**What hardware do you use in your nodes?**
Currently we have a minimum baseline of the following specification:
* CPU: E3-1230
* RAM: 32GB DDR3 ECC
* Storage: RAID 10 with 4x SATA HDD

We do have plans to introduce an E5 / SSD range of nodes in the near future and will outline a separate baseline as and when they become available.

**Where are your services located?**
We currently provide OpenVZ services at the Phoenix NAP datacenter in Phoenix, Arizona.

**Do you have a test IP / file?**
Of course, you are able to ping and traceroute to this IP: **199.231.86.20** as well as test download speed from the following file: [http://199.231.86.20/100mb.test](http://199.231.86.20/100mb.test)

**What connectivity do the nodes have?**
Every node has access to 1Gbps of connectivity, however we currently limit each VPS to a maximum of 100Mbps to give each customer the best possible share.

**What is the best method of contacting support?**
There are a couple of methods, primarily you can either email directly to [support@turbovm.com](mailto:support@turbovm.com) or submit a ticket directly to our [online helpdesk](https://my.turbovm.com/submitticket.php).

Alternatively you can use our live chat system (although primarily for sales queries).

**What methods of payment do you accept?**
We currently accept Paypal payments only, however will likely to be supporting Google Checkout soon.

**Do you offer any sort of refunds?**
Yes we do indeed. All of our services are applicable for a 72 hour no questions asked money-back guarantee. Simply send us an email/ticket within that time frame and we will issue you with a full refund.

If you give us some feedback/suggestions as to what has caused you to have these issues, we may even let you keep the service for the remainder of the money, free of charge.

**Are there any limitations on what I can use/host?**
We do not allow customers to host IRC clients/servers, illegal adult content (legal is fine), TOR, phishing websites or any copyrighted material (without permission).

Please review our [Terms of Service](https://www.turbovm.com/terms) for more information, or alternatively you can send us an email if you are not completely sure about something.
